N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, Appendices, app 7

State Regulations
I. MODEL FORMS FOR USE WITH RULES OF PROCEDURE
Form 1: Notice of Appeal--Sections
647.3, 647.12

Form 2: Answer and Appearance--Sections
647.3, 647.12

Form 3: Application For A Stay--Sections
647.9, 647.3, 647.12

Form 4: Motion to Intervene--Sections
647.6, 647.3, 647.12

Form 5: Affidavit of Service--Section
647.12

Form 6: Letter of Limited Appearance--Section
647.7
II. SCHEDULE OF TIME DEADLINES IN RULES OF PROCEDURE
1. Decision, Determination or Order of Commission, Agency or
APA is made. 2. Within 30 days of date in § 1, File Note of Appeal
[Form 1]. 3. Within seven days of Notice of Appeal, file Answer and

Appearance [Form 2] and transmit original record to board (§
647.4
[a]
). 4. Upon receipt of record, board's docket clerk specifies
briefing schedule according to rules (§
647.4
[c]
). 5. Fifteen days after record is received, appellant serves
and files brief (§
647.5
[a]
), and
request oral argument (§
647.8
). 6. Fifteen days after service and filing of appellant's
brief, respondent files its brief (§
647.5
[b]
). 7. Five days after service and filing of respondent's brief, appellant may file a reply letter of two pages (§
647.5
[d]
). 8. Letters of limited appearance [Form 6] must be filed no
later than the date set for filing respondent's brief, or oral argument, whichever is later (§
647.7
). 9. Motions to Intervene [Form 4] must be filed within 40 days
of Notice of Appeal [Form 1], which falls approximately at this point in time
(§
647.6
). Within 10 days after leave
to intervene is granted, the intervenor's brief is due; reply letters of other
parties are due five days thereafter (§
647.6
). 10. If oral argument is allowed, it is scheduled thereafter
in Albany, during the first full week of the next succeeding month, or
elsewhere on such date as the board may fix (§
647.8
[c]
). 11. Ten days after the board's decision, a petition for
rehearing may be filed (§
647.17
). 12. Applications for stays [Form 3] may be made at any time
(§
647.9
). 13. Affidavits of service [Form 5] shall accompany every
paper filed (§
647.12
). 14. Service by mail adds three days extra to any of these
time periods (§
647.13
). FRESHWATER WETLANDS APPEALS BOARD
